interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: FRESHME Mud Mask - Facial Mask Kaolinite Clay Masks Cleansing and Moisturizing Brightening Smoothing Face Mask, 3.4 fl oz
Review Date: 2020/12/19
Store: FRESHME
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 1.89 x 1.85 inches; 4.9 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is unlike any clay mask that I have ever used before. This product is water based and does not dry on my skin like most clay masks do. After I apply this to my face and leave it on for about 15 minutes, it still feels moist and slick when I go to rinse it off. The texture of this mask is more gel-like than it is clay. It feels lightweight and does not leave my skin feeling too dry and tight. This mask is effective enough for use during the winter, when my skin tends to be more dry. The product packaging looks attractive, but I wonder if they intentionally misspelled the word “moisturizing” as “moistorizing”.
Review Title: Water based mask that does not dry on skin.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce
Mountain Falls
["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Our formula is free of Parabens and Phthalates. Try Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover today."]
{'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Weight': '0.4 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'}
This nail polish remover works very well. It quickly and completely removes nail polish from fingernails and toenails. It’s nice that they included vitamin E and panthenol in the formula. However, I always wash my hands and feet after using nail polish remover, so I don’t think the added panthenol and vitamin E stay on long enough to provide any significant benefits. This product works well enough to deserve 5 stars, but I detracted a star because of the retail cost. There are more affordable nail polish removers that work just as well as this does. The additions of panthenol and vitamin E do not justify the high retail price.
Works quickly and effectively, but is overpriced.
Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare
Manilla Natural Skincare
{'Skin Type': 'mature', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Wrinkles', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
This serum comes in a thick glass bottle and a convenient dropper that makes it easy to apply. The color looks cloudy so I shake it up before each use. It has a thin and watery gel-like texture that is easy to spread evenly over my face. It absorbs quickly into my skin and does not feel sticky nor uncomfortable. It has a sweet scent that is not overpowering. This serum makes my skin looking and feeling smoother than before.
Absorbs quickly and improves the look and feel of skin’s surface.
Dr. Au Anti-Aging Face Oil Retinol Serum by Au Natural Skinfood - Promotes Youthful, Glowing Skin | Collagen Boosting Wrinkle Repair | No Oily Residue - Just Soft to the Touch Skin | Day & Night Moisturizing treatment for Men and Women
AÚ NATURAL SKINFOOD
{'Brand': 'AÚ NATURAL SKINFOOD', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Item Volume': '4 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '0.9 x 0.9 x 3.8 inches; 1.59 Ounces'}
This face oil makes my skin feel smooth and soft. It applies easily and does not feel too heavy nor greasy. This softens the appearance of the lines on my forehead and around my mouth, making them less pronounced. This has a very light and pleasant scent.
Hydrating face oil for soft and smooth skin.
FRESHME Mud Mask - Facial Mask Kaolinite Clay Masks Cleansing and Moisturizing Brightening Smoothing Face Mask, 3.4 fl oz
FRESHME
{'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 1.89 x 1.85 inches; 4.9 Ounces'}
This is unlike any clay mask that I have ever used before. This product is water based and does not dry on my skin like most clay masks do. After I apply this to my face and leave it on for about 15 minutes, it still feels moist and slick when I go to rinse it off. The texture of this mask is more gel-like than it is clay. It feels lightweight and does not leave my skin feeling too dry and tight. This mask is effective enough for use during the winter, when my skin tends to be more dry. The product packaging looks attractive, but I wonder if they intentionally misspelled the word “moisturizing” as “moistorizing”.
Water based mask that does not dry on skin.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Effectiveness:** The user values efficiency in skincare products, recently experimenting with a facial mask that notably differs from traditional clay masks. They appreciate products that maintain moisture and comfort during use, suggesting an ongoing exploration of innovative textures.

- **Ingredient Awareness:** Continuously mindful of ingredient benefits, the user favors natural components. They express skepticism regarding claims made by products and seek tangible results, highlighting a desire for authenticity in ingredient effectiveness.

- **Cost Sensitivity:** Price remains a crucial factor for the user. They are inclined towards products that deliver good value relative to their performance, consistent with their previously established critical approach to pricing.

- **Quality vs. Price:** The user maintains a discerning perspective on quality, balancing high-performance needs with cost-effectiveness. Their evaluations reflect adjustments based on how well products meet their expectations regarding efficacy compared to their price point.

- **Routine-Oriented:** The user possesses established skincare rituals, favoring products that integrate smoothly into their daily routine. Their recent interaction indicates an appreciation for convenient solutions that address specific skin concerns without compromising on overall skin health.

Overall, the user continues to seek effective, high-quality skincare solutions while being judicious about costs and ingredient transparency, ensuring satisfaction with performance and value in their choices.
